Name: Furina
Title: "Endless Solo of Solitude" Furina
Desc: Perpetual muse of chansons and rondeaux.
Source: Reward for inviting Furina to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

12111.Name: Soloist's Solicitation
12111.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Once per Round:</color> If you do not have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> in your Hand, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> card in your Hand.

C112113.Name: Seats Sacred and Secular
C112113.Desc: When in {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Pneuma or {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Ousia states, switch $[A1211]'s state.\nIf you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1031]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1032]</color> on the field, change their state as well.

K1031.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Members</color>
K1031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If your side has characters with at least 6 HP, deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to your character who has taken the least DMG, and deal another 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K1032.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Singer of Many Waters</color>
K1032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

12112.Name: Salon Solitaire
12112.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1211]</color> is currently in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Ousia state. Summons <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112111]</color>.\n(When $[A1211] is in the {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Pneuma state, she will summon <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112112]</color> instead)

C112111.Name: Salon Members
C112111.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 $[K102]. If your side has characters with at least 6 HP, deal 1 $[K5] to your character who has taken the least DMG, and deal another 1 $[K102].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>ï¼šDMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K5.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color>
K5.Desc: Piercing DMG cannot be increased by any bonuses, but cannot be defended against using Shields or DMG Immunity either.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C112112.Name: Singer of Many Waters
C112112.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C112114.Name: Universal Revelry
C112114.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After your active character takes DMG or is healed: </color>Add 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1029]</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K1029.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Revelry</color>
K1029.Desc: Your side deals +1 DMG. (Including Swirl DMG triggered by Characters)\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 1</color> (Can stack. No stack limit)

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.

12115.Name: Arkhe: Seats Sacred and Secular
12115.Desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112113]</color> card in your Hand.

C112113.Name: Seats Sacred and Secular
C112113.Desc: When in {SPRITE_PRESET#3504}Arkhe: Pneuma or {SPRITE_PRESET#3505}Arkhe: Ousia states, switch $[A1211]'s state.\nIf you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1031]</color> or <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1032]</color> on the field, change their state as well.

K1031.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Salon Members</color>
K1031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If your side has characters with at least 6 HP, deal 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Piercing DMG</color> to your character who has taken the least DMG, and deal another 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K1032.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Singer of Many Waters</color>
K1032.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal all your characters for 1 HP. If your side has characters with no more than 5 HP, heal the most injured character for an additional 1 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages: 2</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)
